mdRecord.dcterms:title: Third prize design, W. C. Noland, architect
Reunion edition of the Richmond Dispatch, June 30th, 1896 : Virginia welcomes the Veterans
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Richmond Dispatch and The Richmond Times
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reprint edition. Originally published 1896. A compilation of the daily issues of the Richmond Dispatch and the Richmond Times, for June 30-July 3, 1896, issued for the Confederate Veterans Reunion.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Noland, William C. (William Churchill), 1865-1951
Davis, Jefferson, 1808-1889
Architecture -- Virginia -- Richmond -- Designs and plans
Monuments -- Richmond -- Virginia -- Designs and plans
Richmond (Va.) -- Buildings, structures, etc.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: James Branch Cabell Library. Special Collections and Archives
mdRecord.dcterms:source: Original periodical illustration: Third prize design, W. C. Noland, architect, Reunion edition of the Richmond Dispatch, June 30th, 1896 : Virginia welcomes the Veterans, 1987, p. 17, Richmond, Virginia Maps and Prints Collection, M 190, Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University.
